issue.title: Build from source procedure fails with "Package libsdformat5-dev is not available, but is referred to by another package" on Ubuntu 17.10

content.raw:
I had a similar issue as well.

I approved of a pull request which fixes this issue. It should be merged by now.

But in case, you can try this out.
#!/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/src/b76c21f96ead84293deb5f899e62a5c3632553d2/install_from_source/tutorial_default.md?fileviewer=file-view-default
